subject: Ready to settle down and stop dating adf
body:
Find the Love of Your Life  producttestpanel@speedy.uwaterloo.ca










The above is an advertisement sent by a SeekingMarriage affiliate. If you have any questions or concerns, you may contact us at the following address: 
FindRomance, 1054 Centre St. Suite 214, Thornhill, ON, L4J8E5

If you wish to remove yourself from further SeekingMarriage mailings please visit our site.


Please ensure that you print a copy of the advertisement and include it with your request. 
Should you wish to unsubscribe from the list owner who sent you this email, please follow the unsubscription information below:
